title: EP 107: Pre-Verdict Convo
itunes:title: EP 107: Pre-Verdict Convo
description:
In this special bonus episode we share a convo between Steele, James, Royal-T and Fomby from "On The Line" about Derek Chauvin prior to the actual verdict.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
